solution_line_template: She hand washes them every {weeks_per_wash_cycle} weeks and there are {weeks_per_year} weeks in a year so she washes them {weeks_per_year}/{weeks_per_wash_cycle} = <<{weeks_per_year}/{weeks_per_wash_cycle}={wash_frequency_per_year}>>{wash_frequency_per_year} times per year

It takes her {time_per_wash} minutes to hand wash the pillowcases and she does this {wash_frequency_per_year} times per year for a total of {time_per_wash}*{wash_frequency_per_year} = <<{time_per_wash}*{wash_frequency_per_year}={total_time_per_year_minutes}>>{total_time_per_year_minutes} minutes per year
